message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more profit. How about we meet at $125? It's still a great price for you, and I'll make a little more on the sale.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $115? I think that's a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $118? It's still a bit above your original offer, but I'll make a decent profit. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we compromise at $117?

I understand you're trying to squeeze every last penny out of the deal, Bob! I'm not willing to go as low as $117, but I'll make one more concession. How about we meet at $119? It's still a bit above your original offer, and I'll make a decent profit. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
